name: Algae
description: A cute 2D puzzler where you take control of imaginatively named 'Algae' - an experimental sentient algae. Use Algae's abilities to clone and morph through mind-bending puzzles, avoiding enemies at every turn to break free from the confines of it's world...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0Ghz Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3.0GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 400 MB available space
